title: Club has Disappeared
body:
So I just recently saw that Clubs were brought back online, only to find that the club(that I own) is now gone. I know for certain that I did not leave or disband my Club. Naturally, I go to create another one only to see that the name of it was taken, so it must still exist. Right? Anyone else have this issue? Any Rioters seeing this, are you aware of this issue? 
In-game name : SdotH
Club Name: MajesticSqueeze
Club Tag: Mjsqz

replies.body: it looks like your club wasn't sync'd up, so I gave it a boop.  Relog, and you should see your club back.  I hope that helps!
I see my Name Tag but i still cannot see my club on my profile. can you help me with this please

Are you on the updated client?  What happens if you swap to the legacy version?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know if it shows up on there, and if so then swap back to the updated version to see if it sticks.  Let me know.
It works now thanks so much =)
